        Check if the SD Card is Available

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile(java.io.FileInputStream fromFile,
            java.io.FileOutputStream toFile)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the specified toFile as a byte for byte copy of the fromFile. If toFile already exists, then it will be replaced with a copy of fromFile. The name and path of toFile will be that of toFile.

        Note: fromFile and toFile will be closed by this function.
        Parameters:
        fromFile - - FileInputStream for the file to copy from.
        toFile - - FileOutpubStream for the file to copy to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • copyFile

        public static void copyFile(java.io.File fromFile,
            java.io.File toFile)
                     throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the specified toFile as a byte for byte copy of the fromFile. If toFile already exists, then it will be replaced with a copy of fromFile. The name and path of toFile will be that of toFile.

        Note: fromFile and toFile will be closed by this function.
        Parameters:
        fromFile - - File to copy from.
        toFile - - File to copy to.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException

      • getSDCardPath

        public static java.lang.String getSDCardPath()
        Get the SDCard Path
        Returns:
        the complete path to the SDCard

      • getSDCardPathFile

        public static java.io.File getSDCardPathFile()
        Get the SDCard Path as a File
        Returns:
        the complete path to the SDCard
